definitions.definition: Something apparently seen , heard , or sensed , but having no physical reality ; an image that appears only in the mind ; an illusion or delusion .
A placeholder for a pair of players when there are an odd number of pairs playing.
A test object that reproduces the characteristics of human tissue .

secondary_definitions: Something apparently seen , heard , or sensed , but having no physical reality ; an image that appears only in the mind ; an illusion or delusion .
( bridge ) A placeholder for a pair of players when there are an odd number of pairs playing.
( medical imaging ) A test object that reproduces the characteristics of human tissue .
( colloquial , uncountable ) Short for phantom power
